definition[0]: if a government or organization subsidizes a company, activity etc, it pays part of its costs
example[0]: Farming is heavily subsidized  (=subsidized a lot) by the government.
explanation[0]: Subsidize is often used in the passive
definition[1]: if a government or organization subsidizes a company, activity etc, it pays part of the cost
example[1]: The railroad company is partially subsidized by the federal government.
example[2]: Some companies subsidize high-quality childcare facilities.
